item.title: CVE-2022-4332|2024-08-03T01:34:50.169Z -- sprecher%20automation -- sprecon-e-c%2Fp%2Ft3%20cpu%20pu244x
item.description: In Sprecher Automation SPRECON-E-C/P/T3 CPU in variant PU244x aÂ vulnerable firmware verification has been identified. Through physical access and hardware manipulation, an attacker might be able to bypass hardware-based code verification and thus inject and execute arbitrary code and gain full access of the device.
